mapper.select: select a.countryCode, a.airportCode, a.airportEng, a.airportKor, c.countryKor, c.countryEng, c.pan from airport a, country c where a.countryCode = c.countryCode and ( a.airportCode like '%' || #{searchAirport} || '%' or a.airportKor like '%' || #{searchAirport} || '%' or a.airportEng like '%' || #{searchAirport} || '%' or c.countryKor like '%' || #{searchAirport} || '%' or c.countryEng like '%' || #{searchAirport} || '%' )
